body: Don't forget Notepad++, lol
@flowck https://github.com/zenorocha/dracula-theme#are-you-going-to-support-editor-x
Unfortunately (or not) i'm not an expert in Notepad ++. :/
Neither I am hehe

I've started to create Dracula theme for Brackets. I send a PR if i finish before.

Dracula Theme would be awesome in Brackets (it has really ugly themes :P)...

Awesome!

What's the progress?

Hey Zeno, I just sent a PR to MiguellCastilo in order to add Dracula's Theme to the Brackets Extension: https://github.com/MiguelCastillo/Brackets-Themes/pull/34

What could be the next step?
Let me know if anything else is needed: @felipekm

That's awesome @felipekm!

Could you send a pull request with this theme to this repository too?
And also add instructions about how to install it on Brackets?

Yes sure @zenorocha, I just need the @MiguelCastillo Pull Request approval, once it's ok I will edit the readme file with the instructions. 

The user will need to point his Brackets Extension Manager to the @MiguelCastillo master branche Url, so firstly Dracula need to be there.

Here is the result:

![image](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/205932/1614897/840e825a-55f1-11e3-84b7-bc8aa62e28cd.png)
Ok, that way we'll need to update both files whenever a change is made, right?

Yeah that's right, I thought that way is better, since you referenced the "Brackets Dracula Theme Creation" to the https://github.com/MiguelCastillo/Brackets-Themes repo, which looks like a centralizer of brackets themes.

What do you think about this?
Hey guys, I have taken the pull request in, so Dracula theme is in.  Will be updating brackets registry this weekend too.
@MiguelCastillo Is there a way to maintain code in a single place and use as a git submodule in your repo?
You mean the css theme file for dracula?
Yep
You would have to help me set that up. As long as there is no extra work for anyone using the extension in order to get the theme I am all happy.  Email me and we can definitely hash this out.
Hey Guys, I'm available if you need some help on this

I tried to find a way to use git submodule for only one file, but it doesn't work =/

We'll have to duplicate the file. @felipekm, can you send the PR with the theme and documentation?
Surely
Ping. @felipekm, can you send the PR with the theme and documentation?
Yes I can @zenorocha, I'm on a vacations trip right now, give me a couple of hours to submit it.
Great!
Pending review on #45
